flawed_nl_solution:
The clay pot costs $20 + $9 = $<<20+9=29>>29.
The bag of soil costs $9 - $2 = $<<9-2=7>>7.
The cost to plant the flowers is $9 + $29 + $7 = $<<9+29+7=54>>54.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
